SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BattleshipApp
Class that manages the network connection and game actions of a player in the battleship game.
BattleshipApp.Mode
Connection mode for this player, either client (this player connects to an opponent), or server (opponent is connecting to this player)
BattleshipClient
Class which manages network connections for the client in the battleship game, i.e.
BattleshipGameController
Controller for the battleship game window
BattleshipGUI
Main class for the battleship application.
BattleshipPlayer
Class that manages the state of the Battleship game for one player, with a board for hits on enemy and player ships.
BattleshipPlayer.BattleshipWinner
Current state of the game: initial, in progress, this player won, this player's enemy won.
BattleshipProtocol
Network protocol for the Battleship game.
BattleshipProtocol.BattleshipStates
Protocol states that dictate whose turn it is in the battleship game, or if the game is over.
BattleshipServer
Class which manages network connections for the server in the battleship game, i.e.
Connectable
Interface which defines key operations for a player in the battleship game: connect to an opponent, do something in the game by sending a command, receive a command from an opponent, and return the current port number.
ErrorWindow
Class which displays an error window or an information window.
GameOverWindow
Displays the game over window and allows each player to vote on restarting or not.
Ship
Represents a ship in the battleship game.
Ship.Direction
Direction of the ship.
StartupWindowController
Controller for the startup window.
